LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
To set up PayU:

  • Create an account with PayU or log in with your existing account.
  • Create shop in Online payments / My shops / Add shop.
  • In step 1 fill basic information like name, url, etc.
  • In step 2 choose POS name and make sure POS type is REST API (Checkout).
  • In step 3 copy configuration keys to this form.
